rookie_village.name: Rookie Village
rookie_village.description: The first settlement newcomers encounter in the Zone. A relatively safe outpost where Stalkers gather.

garbage.name: Garbage
garbage.description: A wasteland of scrap metal and industrial waste. Home to scavengers and bandits.

swamps.name: The Great Swamp
swamps.description: Marshy wetlands with radioactive water and many anomaly fields. Used to be Clear Sky territory.

dark_valley.name: Dark Valley
dark_valley.description: A gloomy area with an abandoned factory complex. Known for its high mutant activity.

rostok.name: Rostok (Wild Territory & Bar)
rostok.description: An industrial complex with an established bar that serves as a hub for experienced stalkers.

yantar.name: Yantar
yantar.description: Site of the abandoned factory and underground lab. Home to a scientists' bunker.

army_warehouses.name: Army Warehouses
army_warehouses.description: Former military warehouses now serving as Freedom faction's base of operations.

red_forest.name: Red Forest
red_forest.description: Highly irradiated forest with bright red trees. Extremely dangerous area with powerful mutants.

pripyat.name: Pripyat
pripyat.description: Abandoned city near the Chernobyl NPP. Monolith stronghold and one of the most dangerous zones.

cnpp.name: Chernobyl NPP
cnpp.description: The heart of the Zone. Extremely dangerous with the highest concentration of anomalies and mutants.
